segments.text: Alright , tell me what you think about this one .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Don't you think it's a bit bright ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , maybe you're right . How about this outfit ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That dress looks lovely on you , but it's not very practical , is it ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: No , I don't have any plans to go to a formal dance any time soon , but I love the way it looks . I just want to try it on ! What do you think about this ? It's casual , yet sophisticated .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: I like the jeans , but you need something to go with the top . It's too plain on its own .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: How about this scarf , these earrings , and an anklet ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That might be going overboard a bit . How about just that scarf with a bracelet ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: That's a good idea . You have a lot of good fashion sense .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Thanks . You'd be OK on your own . There are loads of fashion victims out there , and you are not one of them . Have you tried it on yet ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yep . Here it is . What do you think ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: That looks great . Just one more thing-you need some high heels with those jeans . Do you want a pair with a plain pattern or ones with a leopard print on them ?
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: The leopard print sounds fabulous . OK , I'll take it .
segments.speaker: S1
